0.effect_description: This move has no additional effects.
0.flavor_text: This move has no additional effects.

1.effect_description: For 5 seconds, missed notes will not be judged.
1.flavor_text: For 5 seconds, missed notes will not be judged.

2.effect_description: For 10 seconds, missed notes will not be judged.
2.flavor_text: For 10 seconds, missed notes will not be judged.

3.effect_description: For 15 seconds, missed notes will not be judged.
3.flavor_text: For 15 seconds, missed notes will not be judged.

4.effect_description: Groove will not drop for 5 seconds.
4.flavor_text: Groove will not drop for 5 seconds.

5.effect_description: Groove will not drop for 10 seconds.
5.flavor_text: Groove will not drop for 10 seconds.

6.effect_description: Groove will not drop for 15 seconds.
6.flavor_text: Groove will not drop for 15 seconds.

7.effect_description: For 10 seconds while dancing, require only 75 points to gain a Hype Point instead of 90. Time it to maximize the number of notes and be sure to hit the notes well.
7.flavor_text: For 10 seconds, it will be a bit easier to fill up the Heart Gauge.

8.effect_description: For 10 seconds while dancing, require only 82 points to gain a Hype Point instead of 100. Time it to maximize the number of notes and be sure to hit the notes well.
8.flavor_text: For 10 seconds, it will be easier to fill up the Heart Gauge.

9.effect_description: For 10 seconds while dancing, require only 75 points to gain a Hype Point instead of 100. Time it to maximize the number of notes and be sure to hit the notes well.
9.flavor_text: For 10 seconds, it will be much easier to fill up the Heart Gauge.

10.effect_description: Hype Points gained will increase by 1 if groove is positive.
10.flavor_text: Hype Points gained will increase by 1 if groove is positive.

11.effect_description: Hype Points gained will increase by 2 if groove is positive.
11.flavor_text: Hype Points gained will increase by 2 if groove is positive.

12.effect_description: Hype Points gained will increase by 3 if groove is positive.
12.flavor_text: Hype Points gained will increase by 3 if groove is positive.

13.effect_description: Hype Points gained will increase by 1 if groove is negative.
13.flavor_text: Hype Points gained will increase by 1 if groove is negative.

14.effect_description: Hype Points gained will increase by 2 if groove is negative.
14.flavor_text: Hype Points gained will increase by 2 if groove is negative.

15.effect_description: Hype Points gained will increase by 3 if groove is negative.
15.flavor_text: Hype Points gained will increase by 3 if groove is negative.

16.effect_description: Groove level determines the hype points: -2 groove level is 1 hype point, -1 groove level is 2 hype points, 0 groove level is 3 hype points, +1 groove level is 4 hype points, and +2 groove level is 5 hype points.
16.flavor_text: You will receive 1-5 Hype Points, depending on the Pok√©mon's groove.
